TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LinkTargetCollection extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

Docs.summary: Provides a collection of all of the elements in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks By providing all the potential LinkTargetCollection elements in one collection, consuming applications can determine if a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> contains a particular link without having to load the entire <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Contains(class System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget value) cil managed

Docs.summary: Specifies a value that indicates whether a particular is in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Rather than searching the entire document, the Contains method provides a quick means to test for a specified link.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.Windows.Documents.LinkTarget value) cil managed

Docs.summary: Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The link targets that follow the removed target move up to occupy the vacated spot. The indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
